title: Picture Windows Add Natural Light to Traditional Living Room
description: Black windows in this traditional living room welcome natural light to the space. A tall, grandiose wall of windows invites people in to sit back and relax. Furthering the traditional aesthetic of the room is the simple grille pattern on each picture window.
